p: Cinnamomum cassia, C. loureiroi, and C. burmannii barks were collected from the trees with the age from 10 to 15 in Guangxi province of China. C. wilsonii barks were obtained from the trees with the age of 11 in Sichuan province of China. The collected samples were ground to fine powder by a cutting mill and pass through a 50 mesh screen. The ground samples were stored at −20°C until used.
